main_categories: Short-stay visas (Type C) - for tourism, business, family visits, transit
Long-stay / National visas (Type D) - for work, study, or residence in a specific Schengen country

ees_implementation.description: EU's new biometric Entry/Exit System (EES) rollout for non-EU travellers

short_stay_type_c.stay_limit: Up to 90 days within any 180-day period
required_documents: Valid passport (at least 3 months beyond planned exit)

long_stay_type_d.special_notes: Days may or may not count against 90/180 rule depending on visa specifics

general_requirements.passport_validity: At least 3 months beyond planned exit date
general_requirements.insurance: Mandatory for Type C visa (minimum €30,000 coverage)

processing.extended_time: Up to 45-60 days in some cases
processing.service_fees: Applicable if using external providers (e.g., VFS)
